Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Can perform Reversible Exchange with Super Saiyan Gohan (Teen)
- Ki +5 and DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Medium chance of performing a critical hit
- Great chance of launching an additional Super Attack
- Receives an additional Ki +2 per Type Ki Sphere obtained
*With a Ki Sphere obtained*
- {passiveImg:once}Chance of evading enemy's attack 77%{passiveImg:up_g}
*2 or more Type Ki Spheres obtained*
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking
- DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g} when receiving an attack
*4 or more Type Ki Spheres obtained*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
- Guards all attacks
*Per "Youth" Category ally on the team*
- ATK 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 10%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Per "Hybrid Saiyans" Category ally on the team*
- DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 500%)
*When receiving a Super Attack*
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 15%{passiveImg:up_g} temporarily
- All allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} within the turn
- "Youth" Category allies' chance of evading enemy's attack 5%{passiveImg:up_g}
for 2 turns (self excluded)

7808.superDescription:
Raises ATK & DEF for 4 turns and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7809.superDescription:
Raises ATK for 1 turn and 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; 
raises Super Class allies' ATK by 50% 
for 1 turn and great chance of raising 
Super Class allies' DEF by 50% for 1 turn

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Fusion
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Massively raises ATK temporarily and 
causes ultimate damage to enemy; 
"Youth" Category allies' 
ATK & DEF +20% in battle
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated upon entering 
attacking turn (once only, be it 
before or after Reversible Exchange)
